医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
探索癌症细胞死亡与细胞衰老之间的相互作用衰老细胞分泌已知可以促进癌细胞生长的物质。可以选择性地杀死这些细胞或抑制物质分泌的药物的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/exploring-the-interaction-the--intaraction-cell-death-death-and-cellular-senescence-r-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/exploring-the-interaction-between-cell-death-death-and-cellular-senescence-rin-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=383ee25d-f72b-43f3-b6f3-b6f5-556f856f85333b1df Wed, 29 Jan 2025 09:13:19 -0500 Exploring the interaction between cell death and cellular senescence in cancer
DNA分析可以识别非法毒品交易的关键参与者DNA分析技术正在迅速发展，创造了通过分析非法药物的外部和携带的Ziplock塑料袋来识别参与，包装和运输非法胶囊的人的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/dna-profiling-could-indishify-nistify-nistify-key-players-in-illegal-drug-trade.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/dna-profiling-could-sideify-nistify-nistify-key-players-in-illegal-drug-trade.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e807df18-2c52-4605-ae9d-356bcb4ec95a Wed, 29 Jan 2025 08:44:42 -0500 DNA profiling could identify key players in illegal drug trade
Bruker推出了制药和生命科学研究的红外成像显微镜Bruker Corporation宣布推出了Lumos™II Ilim，这是一种基于量子的级联激光（QCL）红外成像显微镜。新的Lumos II ILIM重新定义了性能标准，使制药和生命科学研究人员能够以增强的空间分辨率捕获扩大区域的超快IR图像。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/bruker-launches-infrared-imaging-microscope-for-pharma-and-pharma-and-life-science-science-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/bruker-launches-infrared-image-microscope-for-pharma-pharma-and-pharma-and-life-science-science-science-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6C249959-9F1F-4B3C-B711-F8A2B98A4722 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 08:26:00 -0500 Bruker launches infrared imaging microscope for pharma and life science research
遗传指纹可以帮助预测细菌的抗生素耐药性抗生素抵抗是每年造成超过一百万人死亡的全球公共卫生危机。到2050年，世界卫生组织估计，随着越来越多的细菌为旨在对抗它们的药物开发防御性，它可能会超越癌症和心脏病，这是死亡的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/genetic-fingerprint-could-help-predict-predict-predict-antibiotic-resistance-in-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/genetic-fingerprint-could-help-predict-predict-predict-antibiotic-resistance-in-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1669d42c-bc8d-4f43-83e1-8757e79609ce Wed, 29 Jan 2025 08:10:12 -0500 Genetic fingerprint could help predict antibiotic resistance in bacteria
研究旨在探索躁郁症患者大脑的结构改变由USC Mark和Mary Stevens神经影像学研究所（Stevens INI）领导的一项新研究将探索双相情感障碍患者（BD）的结构性改变，这是一种慢性精神疾病，这是企图自杀率最高的慢性精神疾病 - 目前尚无生物学工具来指导诊断或治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-aims-to-ecplore-screstural-strestural-alterations-in-the-brains-hbrains-pepele-with-bilar disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/study-aims-to-ecplore-screstural-structuration-alterations-in-the-brains-in-the-brains-pepeople-with-bilar with-bilard-bilor-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb29f3cb-6c15-44db-a4e1-0774bb86217a Wed, 29 Jan 2025 07:59:20 -0500 Study aims to explore structural alterations in the brains of people with bipolar disorder
Disperazol Pharma加入AMR行业联盟，以对抗抗菌素抵抗领先的生物技术公司Disperazol Pharma开发了拆除关键克（阴性病原体）生物膜的化合物，今天宣布已加入AMR行业联盟。 AMR目前负责全球范围内估计每年有127万人死亡，如果延迟行动，预测会警告更大的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/disperazol-pharma-joins-joins-the-amr-industry-alliance-to-combat-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/disperazol-pharma-joins-joins-the-amr-industry-alliance-to-combat-ancombat-antimicrobial-robial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adb64b8c-90e4-4228-8894-5f3e4fe6ccfc Wed, 29 Jan 2025 07:28:00 -0500 Disperazol Pharma joins the AMR Industry Alliance to combat antimicrobial resistance
与10名癌症患者中有4例神经疼痛有关的化学疗法在全球范围内，癌症化学疗法与持续的严重周围神经疼痛（神经病）有关，每10名接受这些药物治疗的患者中的4例，这表明对可用证据的汇总数据分析，发表在《开放访问》杂志的区域麻醉和疼痛医学上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/chemotheraphy-linked-to-persistent-nneve-pain-pain-ind-in-bin-bin-in-bin-bin-bin-b-10-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/chemotherapy-linked-to-persistent-nneve-peristent-pain-pain-in-in-in-in-in-in-in-10-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7d24afe-e564-4795-a4d3-9b3e1b6f9e72 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 06:52:48 -0500 Chemotherapy linked to persistent nerve pain in 4 in 10 cancer patients
白细胞计数预测了老年女性的COVID-19症状的严重程度得益于治疗方案的进步，至少对于大多数人而言，Covid-19诊断不再像以前那样可怕。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/leukocyte-count-predicts-predicts-severity-covid-covid-19-symptoms-ingoms-inger-nolder-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/leukocyte-count-predicts-predicts-severity-covid-covid-covid-19-sympts-symptoms-inger-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f53f3d8-4e87-496d-81fa-81fa-2e9c16d97774 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 06:29:05 -0500 Leukocyte count predicts severity of COVID-19 symptoms in older women
Tecan介绍Veya：将数字可扩展的自动化带到全球实验室实验室自动化的全球领导者泰肯（Tecan）今天宣布了Veya™的揭幕，这是一个变换液体处理平台，旨在为各种规模的实验室带来效率，精度和合规性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/tecan-introduces-veya-bringa-bringing-digital-scalable-automation-automation-to-labs-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/tecan-introduces-veeda-bringa-bringing-digital-scalable-automation-automation-to-labs-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4c18DF0C-2303-4A4A-A08C-73236C0B0360 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 06:22:00 -0500 Tecan introduces Veya: bringing digital, scalable automation to labs worldwide
Bio-Rad启动开拓者标签和开拓者星际染料标签套件，用于抗体偶联的星际染料生命科学研究和临床诊断产品的全球领导者Bio-Rad Laboratories，Inc。今天宣布推出其Trailblazer™标签和Trailblazer Starbright™染料标签套件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/bio-rad-launches-trailblazer-tag-and-trag-and-trailblazer-starbright-dye-label-kits-for- antiboto-antibody-antibody-andibody-andibody-andiboto-conjugation-conjugation-conjugation-to-starbright-to-starbright-dyes。 aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250129/bio-rad-launches-trailblazer-tag-and-trag-and-trailblazer-starbright-dye-label-kits-for- antiboto-antibody-antibody-andibody-andibody-andiboto-conjugation-conjugation-conjugation-to-starbright-to-starbright-dyes。 aspx＃评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb296851-5AF1-426E-BB6E-4B7B7B47ADDB29 Wed, 29 Jan 2025 06:21:00 -0500 Bio-Rad launches TrailBlazer Tag and TrailBlazer StarBright Dye Label Kits for antibody conjugation to StarBright Dyes
